name: Sushi Junai
description: For all-you-can-eat customers at Sushi Junai to track the food they order and eat.
technologies: Uses JavaScript, React.js, MySQL, Sequelize, Passport.js, Yelp API

name: COVID Road Trip
description: Plan a road trip that avoids coronavirus hotspots. Currently under construction because our Google Maps API free trial expired.
technologies: Uses JavaScript, jQuery, Mapbox Directions API, Google Maps Geocoding API and Novel CoVID19 API.

name: CodeTube
description: Browse coding tutorials and save your favorites to your personal library.
technologies: Uses JavaScript, jQuery, YouTube API, Passport.js, Sequelize.js and MySQL

name: Bookmarked
description: Browse books and save your favorites for later.
technologies: Uses JavaScript, React.js, Google Books API, MongoDB, Mongoose, Express.js, Node.js

name: Weather Dashboard
description: Search for any city in the world and see its current weather and five-day forecast.
technologies: Uses JavaScript, jQuery, OpenWeather API and Moment.js

name: Workday Scheduler
description: Plan your workday with this color-coded web application and save your schedule to local storage.
